volumeInfo.title: The Ptsd Workbook: Simple, Effective Techniques for Overcoming Traumatic Stress Symptoms
authors: Mary Beth Williams, PhD, Lcsw, Cts
volumeInfo.description: In the third edition of the best-selling "The PTSD Workbook, "psychologists and trauma experts Mary Beth Williams and Soili Poijula offer readers the most effective tools available for treating post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). In this fully revised and updated workbook, readers will learn how to move past the trauma they have experienced; manage symptoms such as insomnia, anxiety, and flashbacks; and find important updates reflecting the new DSM-V definition of PTSD.
